SELECT user_id as userIds, nid, borrow_nid AS borrowNid, account, client, date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime, 'tender' as flag FROM ht_borrow_tender
`status` = 1
AND create_time >= CONCAT(#{searchStartDate},' 00:00:00')
AND create_time <= CONCAT(#{searchEndDate},' 23:59:59')
union all
SELECT user_id as userIds, assign_nid as nid, credit_tender_nid AS borrowNid, assign_pay as account, client, date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime, 'credit' as flag FROM ht_credit_tender
AND create_time >= CONCAT(#{searchStartDate},' 00:00:00')
AND create_time <= CONCAT(#{searchEndDate},' 23:59:59')

SELECT IFNULL(flg.order_id, rflg.order_id) AS freezeOrderId, ry.borrow_nid AS borrowNid, from_unixtime(ry.repay_yestime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS repayTime, CASE WHEN hw.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN DATEDIFF( from_unixtime(ry.repay_yestime), from_unixtime(hw.recover_last_time) ) + 1 ELSE DATEDIFF( from_unixtime(ry.repay_yestime), from_unixtime(hw.recover_last_time) ) END AS spentday, (ry.repay_capital_yes+ry.repay_interest+ry.charge_interest+ry.charge_penalty_interest) AS account FROM ht_borrow_repay ry LEFT JOIN ht_borrow hw ON ry.borrow_nid = hw.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_bank_repay_org_freeze_log flg ON flg.borrow_nid = ry.borrow_nid AND FROM_UNIXTIME( ry.repay_yestime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = date_format(flg.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AND flg.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN ht_bank_repay_freeze_log rflg ON rflg.borrow_nid = ry.borrow_nid AND FROM_UNIXTIME( ry.repay_yestime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = date_format( rflg.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) WHERE ry.repay_status = 1
AND ry.repay_yestime < hw.repay_last_time AND hw.recover_last_time > unix_timestamp('2018-04-01 00:00:00')
AND ry.repay_yestime >= unix_timestamp(CONCAT(#{searchStartDate},' 00:00:00'))
AND ry.repay_yestime <= unix_timestamp(CONCAT(#{searchEndDate},' 23:59:59'))

SELECT b.borrow_nid, 'borrow/borrowList' AS link, i.`name` AS title, b.user_id AS userid, b.plan_nid AS planNid, i.company_or_personal AS companyOrPersonal, b.account AS amount, CASE WHEN b.is_month = 0 THEN CONCAT(b.borrow_period,'天') ELSE CONCAT(b.borrow_period,'个月') END AS borrow_period, (b.borrow_apr*0.01) AS interest, CASE WHEN i.asset_attributes = 1 THEN '抵押标' WHEN i.asset_attributes = 2 THEN '质押标' ELSE '信用标' END AS asset_type, t.borrow_name as borrow_type, CASE WHEN b.plan_nid is not NULL THEN '智投' ELSE '散标' END AS product_type, CASE WHEN s.`name` = '先息后本' THEN '月付息到期还本' WHEN s.`name` = '按月计息，到期还本还息' THEN '按月到期还款' WHEN s.`name` = '按天计息，到期还本还息' THEN '按天到期还款' WHEN s.`name` = '等额本息' THEN '月分期付款' ELSE s.`name` END AS repay_type, 1 as percentage, '成功' AS bid_state, 'AA' AS credit, from_unixtime(b.verify_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS verify_time, from_unixtime(b.reverify_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS reverify_time, b.tender_times as invest_count, i.borrow_contents as borrow_detail, CASE WHEN i.finance_purpose = '01' THEN '个人消费' WHEN i.finance_purpose = '02' THEN '个人经营' WHEN i.finance_purpose = '03' THEN '个人资金周转' WHEN i.finance_purpose = '04' THEN '房贷' WHEN i.finance_purpose = '05' THEN '企业经营' WHEN i.finance_purpose = '06' THEN '企业周转' ELSE '其他' END AS attribute1 FROM ht_borrow b LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info i ON i.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type t ON t.borrow_cd = b.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style s ON s.nid = b.borrow_style WHERE b.reverify_status = 6 AND b.create_time >= CONCAT(#{dateStart},' 00:00:00') AND b.create_time <= CONCAT(#{dateEnd},' 23:59:59')
UNION ALL
SELECT c.credit_nid as borrow_nid, 'borrow/creditList' as link, c.bid_name as title, c.credit_user_id AS userid, '' AS planNid, ru.user_type AS companyOrPersonal, SUM(t.assign_pay) as amount, CONCAT(c.credit_term,'天') AS borrow_period, (c.bid_apr*0.01) as interest, '债权转让标'AS asset_type, '债权转让标' AS borrow_type, '散标' AS project_type, CASE WHEN s.`name` = '先息后本' THEN '月付息到期还本' WHEN s.`name` = '按月计息，到期还本还息' THEN '按月到期还款' WHEN s.`name` = '按天计息，到期还本还息' THEN '按天到期还款' WHEN s.`name` = '等额本息' THEN '月分期付款' ELSE s.`name` END AS repay_type, ROUND(SUM(t.assign_pay)/c.credit_account,4) AS percentage, '成功' AS bid_state, 'AA' AS credit, c.create_time AS verify_time, c.end_time AS reverify_time, c.assign_num AS invest_count, i.borrow_contents as borrow_detail, CASE WHEN i.finance_purpose = '01' THEN '个人消费' WHEN i.finance_purpose = '02' THEN '个人经营' WHEN i.finance_purpose = '03' THEN '个人资金周转' WHEN i.finance_purpose = '04' THEN '房贷' WHEN i.finance_purpose = '05' THEN '企业经营' WHEN i.finance_purpose = '06' THEN '企业周转' ELSE '其他' END AS attribute1 FROM ht_borrow_credit c LEFT JOIN ht_credit_tender t ON t.credit_nid = c.credit_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info i ON i.borrow_nid = c.bid_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow b ON b.borrow_nid = c.bid_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style s ON s.nid = b.borrow_style LEFT JOIN ht_r_user ru ON ru.user_id = c.credit_user_id WHERE c.credit_status in ( 1, 2 ) AND c.credit_capital_assigned > 0 AND c.create_time >= CONCAT(#{dateStart},' 00:00:00') AND c.create_time <= CONCAT(#{dateEnd},' 23:59:59') GROUP BY credit_id
